Reviews.Content: Family jewel!! What we loved about this place: the lush garden, seclusion, quiet, warm welcome, and attentive, generous service. It's always spotlessly clean, and handy to the beach market and lots of restaurants. We've stayed there 8x in the last 11 years, and things get better each year, especially the food and service in the restaurant.
Reviews.Author: ktpi
